Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's adventures in a circus, his confrontation with fraudster Billings and the vengeful Matto Grasso, showcasing his strength and heroism.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arrival and Paul Bunyan's Performance
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and the town's excited reaction to the circus arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Unveiling the Tent Trouble
sub_scenes.description: The man in checkered shirt investigates sounds of trouble inside a tent and confronts Billings.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan resolves the immediate threats, questions his assailant, and receives a job offer from the circus owner.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Arson and Bunyan's Heroism
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso's jealousy leads to an arson attempt, which Paul Bunyan heroically thwarts.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaimed Performance and Matto Grasso's Jealousy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Escape and Arena Chase
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso's new scheme involves releasing Gigantico, leading to a chase through the circus arena.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Scheme: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico's Escape and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action
Continued Escape and Second Weight Attempt

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan captures Matto Grasso in a dramatic fashion but ultimately declines the job offer and leaves.

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Observation and Paul Bunyan's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Exotic Encounters
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's fantastical adventures, from battling a Tibetan ogress to rescuing a princess, showcasing his bravery and encounters with the supernatural.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Ogress and Talking Head
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Marco Polo's Tibetan adventure and an encounter with a talking severed head.

sub_scenes.title: Magic Dagger and Journey to Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo receives a magic dagger and is directed towards Hi-Toun and Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Misinterpretation of Festivities
Marco's Introduction and the King's Welcome
The King's Plea for Help Regarding Princess Lotus
Marco's Agreement to Help Find Princess Lotus
Encounter with a Mourning Woman in Need
The Mourning Woman's Plea and the Ominous Destination

sub_scenes.title: The Ogress of Tibet and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo encounters the Ogress of Tibet, is imprisoned, but escapes and helps a princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and the Rat Revelation
The Ogress's Transformation and Marco's Imprisonment
Confrontation with Giant Rats and the Ogress
The Special Knife and Ogre's Defeat
Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Misunderstood Mourning and Arrival at Palace

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and its Deadly Cost
Major_Arcs.description: A tale of greed and betrayal over a hidden treasure in Agra, revealing the dark side of human desires.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Treasure Tale
sub_scenes.description: The Treasure Keeper introduces a story of treasure, violence, and death.

sub_scenes.title: Prisoner's Bargain and Captain's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner in a penal colony reveals a treasure and makes a deal with Captain Brooking, who then betrays him.

narrative_arcs.title: Officer's Request to Speak with Captain Brooking
The Revelation of Treasure and Desperate Bargain
The Agreement and Promise of Escape

sub_scenes.title: Vengeance and Return
sub_scenes.description: Jordan realizes the betrayal, vows revenge, and eventually returns to England.

narrative_arcs.title: Release from Prison and Return to England
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance
Arrival in England and Continued Vigil

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deadly Treasure
sub_scenes.description: Jordan confronts Captain Brooking, leading to a midnight meeting and a deadly fight over the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal
The Wounded Man and the Chest

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunting of Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: A supernatural mystery unfolds at the Matthews Estate, where Dr. Styx and Henry Northrup confront ghostly presences and the legacy of hatred.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Case
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the case of the Matthews Estate, linked to Vincent Matthews' crimes.

sub_scenes.title: Entering Matthews Place and Confronting the Ghost
sub_scenes.description: Northrup arrives at the Matthews estate, ignores warnings, and confronts the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Salvation through Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked figure orchestrates forgiveness and brotherly love to release Vincent and Rosalind's spirits.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of the Murdered Sister
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Tragic Voyages
Major_Arcs.description: The historical saga of Henry Hudson's relentless search for the Northwest Passage, ending in mutiny and tragedy.

sub_scenes.title: The Quest for the Northwest Passage Begins
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Henry Hudson's tragic story and the Dutch East India Company's proposal for a new voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's first voyage with the Half Moon, facing crew discontent and ultimately failing to find the passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Acceptance of Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Ice, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's second, ill-fated voyage to the north, leading to being ice-bound and mutiny.

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: The thrilling tale of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, tasked with rescuing a kidnapped princess from the clutches of the Tatar leader Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: The Caliph's Command and Journey Begins
sub_scenes.description: Hassan receives his mission from the Caliph and sets off into the desert to confront the Tartars.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Oasis Discovery: Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Location of the Prisoner
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the Tartar camp, neutralizes a sentry, and locates the kidnapped daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Kurgan's Challenge
sub_scenes.description: Hassan attempts contact with the prisoner but is discovered and captured by the Tartars, leading to a challenge by Kurgan.

narrative_arcs.title: Internal Resolve and Desperate Need to Win

sub_scenes.title: The Contest and Honorable Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Hassan faces Kurgan's challenge, uses wit to win, and secures the princess's release and an honorable farewell.

narrative_arcs.title: Signal for Contest and Hassan's Strategy
Plea for Mercy and Honorable Agreement
Imminent Departure and a Parting Kiss
A Fine Reward and Continued Journey
